casebody.data:
David PLUMLEY, Trustee of the Erma Rogers Revocable Trust, on Behalf of Themselves and All Others Similarly Situated, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
ERICKSON RETIREMENT COMMUNITIES, Redwood Capital Investments, Inc., Senior Campus Living, Inc., and Senior Campus Services, LLC, Defendants,
and
Henry Ford Village, Inc., Redwood-Erc Management, LLC, and Life Care Services, LLC, Defendants-Appellants. SC: 157096
COA: 332495 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 12, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
